Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImplementation
public interface UserService
Interface for user-related operations in the application.

This interface provides methods to handle user registration, retrieval, and management, as well as integration with Spring Security for user authentication.

Author: Venkat

  • Method Details

    • loadUserByUsername

      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String username) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Loads a user by their username for authentication.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to be loaded
      Returns:
      a UserDetails object containing the user's information
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user with the given username cannot be found

    • getAuthorities

      Collection<? extends org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority> getAuthorities()
      Retrieves the authorities granted to the current user.
      Returns:
      a collection of granted authorities for the current user

    • findUserProfileByJwt

      User findUserProfileByJwt(String jwt) throws Exception
      Finds the user profile associated with the provided JWT.
      Parameters:
      jwt - the JSON Web Token used to identify the user
      Returns:
      the User object corresponding to the JWT
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while retrieving the user

    • registerUser

      User registerUser(UserRegistrationDTO userRegistrationDTO)
      Registers a new user based on the provided registration data.
      Parameters:
      userRegistrationDTO - the data transfer object containing user registration details
      Returns:
      the newly registered User object

    • createAdministrator

      User createAdministrator(UserRegistrationDTO input)
      Creates an administrator user based on the provided input data.
      Parameters:
      input - the data transfer object containing administrator user details
      Returns:
      the newly created administrator User object
